page.title: 06 OCCUPATION SURVEY
page.content: Beaumont Park is a large residential estate situated at the northen boundary of Whitley Bay built in the 1970's.An extensive survey was conducted to find out the main occupations,methods of transport used and places of work of the inhabitants of the estate.Out of the people who were interviewed;1% worked in the Primary sector,8% worked in the Secondary sector,91% worked in the Tertiary sector. 90% of those interviewed used their own cars to travel to work,while 7% used the local Rail/Bus system,2% walked to work in Whitley Bay,while 1% used Newcastle airport. 93% of those interviewed worked in the conurbation of North Tyneside.Another 1% worked in Northumberland and Durham with 3% worked at home and 3% worked abroad.
